title: Stuffed Mushrooms
description: Savory mushrooms stuffed with cream cheese and herbs.

title: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Tender grilled salmon fillet served with lemon butter sauce.

title: Pasta Carbonara
description: Spaghetti tossed with pancetta, egg yolks, and Parmesan cheese.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey chocolate center, served with vanilla ice cream.

title: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

title: Key Lime Pie
description: Refreshing pie made with tangy key lime juice in a graham cracker crust.

title: BLT Sandwich
description: crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and juicy tomato on toasted bread—a perfect blend of savory and fresh flavors.

title: T-bone steak with mashed potatoes
description: Savor a grilled T-bone steak paired with creamy mashed potatoes—a deliciously satisfying meal of tender, smoky flavors and comforting textures.

title: Tomato soup
description: Savor a rich and velvety tomato soup, bursting with tangy sweetness and subtle herb flavors.
